Your sister Crystal needed to be picked up from school. She got out earlier than your youngest sister, and normally you would pick her up. Today though was a bit different as your mother informed you that her two friends, Kaley and Mike, were coming home with her. No problem as you certainly had plenty of room in your car. You grabbed your keys and walked out the door.

Driving down the road, you saw the usual: businesses, people walking their dogs, and the occasion kid making potty in somebody's mouth. It still confused you why so many public places hired professional potties if kids are still gonna be allowed to do it out in the open. Cruising along, you saw a sign for a kid-specific restroom, which featured a stick person sitting overtop a larger stick person's head. After awhile, you arrived at Crystal's school as they let out. She came bounding over to your vehicle, her two friends in tow, Kaley was a slim black girl and Mike a little brunette boy, both in Crystal's grade. Quickly, all three hopped in the backseat and you drove off. As you rolled down the road, you started to listen in on the kids' coversation.

"Yeah, Ms.Jenkins spent all of recess licking her clean." Mike replied, "Man, I wish I could get Ms.J to lick my butt that long. Shes the best at it."

"I don't know, I hear Crystal's brother is pretty good at licking butts, being a full potty and all." Kaley remarked, which had you confused. You certainly were nobody's toilet. You were sure Crystal only said her brother was her potty to seem cool.

152.content:
You changed into some swimming trunks, flip flops, and grabbed a towel before heading out the door. There was a local community center with public pools, and you enjoyed going down there to relax and float around for awhile.

After arriving, you quickly made your way to the outdoor pool. Borrowing an inflatable float, you laid back and relaxed.

After a fifteen minutes or so of relaxation, some commotion caught your eye. A woman dressed in a one-piece swimsuit with goggles, clearly a competitive swimmer, was seemingly arguing with a man in a nice shirt and tie. Being nosy and curious, you got out of the pool to investigate.

Walking past them and pretending to use the vending machine, you began to eavesdrop.

"I can't believe you're too cheap to hire somebody"

"I just don't think it's a priority."

"Not a priority? The team will improve tremendously with one!"

"Okay, okay! If it gets you to stop yelling I'll look into hiring somebody"

With that, the woman, who looked to be only in her mid twenties, walked inside.

Suddenly the man turned around and realized you had been listening "Sorry you had to hear that little dispute"

"Don't worry about it. If don't mind me asking though, what was it about?" You asked

"She's the coach of the local elementary school's girl swim team." He explained, "They have a partnership with our location and use our pools. She's insisting we need to hire a human potty for the girls"

"Why is that so important?" You inquired confused.

"Apparently every competitive team is doing it." He elaborated "Means the girl's don't wait in line in the public ones, and don't have to sit on cold, hard, wet seats. It also keeps the water clean as they're less likely to go in the pool"

"Makes sense" you shrugged. Turning to walk off the man stopped you.

"Say, you're not looking for a job, are you?" He asked. Perplexed by his offer, you had to ponder for a moment. You never thought you'd ever work as a child's toilet. That was, until he told you your starting wage. It was, well, incredible, and soon he was giving you instructions are where to go.

"Girls, this gentleman has just agreed to be your new digestive assistant and hygiene coordinator, which is another way of saying a human toilet" she explained, as all the girls giggle "So we're going to call him Mr.Potty."

She then led you over to a side of the poop where you were going to be stationed. "Just sit here until we need you"
